Text: HorribleSubs is the name of the sub team right?
I guess so, i trust their website very much :)
HorribleSubs is that the name of the team

Why can't anyone upload the vid's in MP4 or MP3? I've gone through hell and back trying to get them to be watched through my PS3. I know we can just get a Converter and change them just like that.. but.. Is there something that's preventing someone from Uploading them in Default vids? Besides, wouldn't the Torrent get better likes and ease off more stress that way? It's just my Opinion though.

If the lack of MKV support on the PS3 is a problem, complain to Sony. It would be trivial for them to add it. Almost any other Sony device, including most of their Blu-ray decks and their streaming player box, will do MKV. It's the same frustration on the Xbox side.

MKV does a lot of useful stuff, especially for an international level of use. I'd rather add a $50 streaming media player box to my system than argue with the people who run the PS3 and Xbox operations.
